channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023100228
item.description:
Report X-2023100228

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-01T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-23
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF THE BOX BEING DROPPED AND 2 BOTTLES OF ISOPROPYL IS MISSING. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE REMAING 2 BOTTLES WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO THE PACKAGED BEING DROPPED AND 2 OF THE ISOPROPYL GOING MISSING. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023100213
item.description:
Report X-2023100213

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-23
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during Sunrise sort in plastic drum. DescribePack: Inspection of "FISHER SCIENTIFIC HYDROCHLORIC ACID" showed box to be wet and smoking, most likely broken from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be disposed of in a salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023100819
item.description:
Report X-2023100819

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM THE SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO THE EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET FROM THE HUB AND BROUGHT TO LWOO FOR PROCESSING.SHIPMENT WAS LEFT IN DAMAGE AREA AND THERE WAS NO COMMUNICATION PROVIDED. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS THERMO FISHER SCIENTIFIC ISOPROPANOL 1X2.5 LITERS GLASS BOTTLE WAS CRACKED, CRUSHED AND BROKED AND CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 100% SPILLAGE. WHICH ALSO CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE OUTER PACKAGING AS WELL. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023100199
item.description:
Report X-2023100199

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING NITRIC ACID WAS FOUND WITH ONE BOTTLE COMPLETELY LEAKED OUT. THE BOX WAS HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE DISPOSED OF UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO IMPROPER HANDLING WHILE BEING REMOVED FROM THE BELT CAUSING 1 BOTTLE OF NITRIC ACID TO BE COMPLETED LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023100193
item.description:
Report X-2023100193

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM THE SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO THE EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET DURING THE DAY SORT. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT 2X1GALLON (PLASTIC BOTTLES) ZEP CONCENTRATED INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER WITH A LOOSE CAPS WHICH CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 10% SPILLAGE FROM BOTH BOTTLES. WHICH ALSO CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE OUTER PACKAGING AS WELL. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023100178
item.description:
Report X-2023100178

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100178 SequenceEvent: Package of "CIDEHOL 60% USP ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL" arrived at hazmat cage during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed bottom of package to be wet from internal leakage from loose caps. Damage most likely caused by being mishandled or dropped. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a plastic salvage drum, unless otherwise stated. 2. X-2023100198 SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING TETRAHYDROFURAN WAS FOUND WITH 1 BOTTLE COMPLETELY LEAKED OUT. THE REMAINS OF THE SHATTERED BOTTLE WAS HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE DISPOSED OF UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO IMPROPER HANDLING, DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box crushed and torn while in transit causing two of four Nu-Calgon Nu-Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner 1 Gallon bottles to be crushed and crack. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box crushed and torn while in transit causing two of four Nu-Calgon Nu-Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner 1 Gallon bottles to be crushed and crack. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

item.title: Report E-2023100640
item.description:
Report E-2023100640

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: WESTAMPTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While moving a pallet of freight on the loading dock with a forklift the operator accidently hit another pallet of boxes that was staged on the dock with the pallet he was moving consequently slightly puncturing two boxes that were staged on the pallet contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was swept up and placed into a recovery container as were the two punctured boxes and shipped to the ultimate consignee without further incident.
